nodes.text: Choaaty Mossk was an agent of the G'uotr Network in the city of D'larah on the planet Demophon during the Galactic Civil War. He was a burly, bearded man with a long criminal record and a tendency to disobey the orders of his superiors in the Network. He was a former pirate and repairman at D'larah's spaceport, and he used that knowledge to steal ships for the Network.
